content.rendered:
Ophthalmology Technician | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full-Time Days, Monday-Friday 8am-5pm
  • Large fast paced Ophthalmology practice
  • Involved in direct patient care for both general and/or preventive eye care
  • Determine optimal testing techniques under the supervision of the staff physician
  • Completed an accredited Ophthalmic/Optometric program OR One (1) year experience as an Ophthalmic/Optometric Assistant OR certified Ophthalmic Assistant (COA)  required
  • Good customer relation skills
  • Excellent knowledge of Ophthalmic procedures
  • Experience with EMR a plus
  • Excellent benefits, competitive salary and scrub allowance
